name: ACE B
text: This place ROCKS!  Seriously.  Great service, AMAZING PIZZA, fast delivery.  I highly recommend Extreme Pizza.  The 'Yard Sale' pizza rocks my world!  I order for our office and spend about $200 each order.  The salads are fantastic, the …More

name: Pamela Winders
text: I've been ordering from Extreme Pizza for 7 years and counting and haven't yet had anything but deliciousness!  Tonight's pizza was no different, Pie Perfection!  Service has always been great for me and tonight the delivery time was …More

name: Erica McMahon
text: No vegan cheese :( I was able to Place an order for a vegan pizza online and was waiting for a While before they called and told me they don’t have vegan cheese. The company has it as an option too, they just think not enough people enjoy …More

name: Taylor B
text: Delicious pizza. Awesome crew (new management). try the chips and salsa if you're picking up, really good! Recommend to all! 10/27/15

name: Tamara Saad
text: Great pizza. I loved seeing the pizza’s dough hand tossed and made in front of me.

name: EStramel09
text: Ordered the pizza. About An hour and a half later they called and took my credit card number and said the pizza was on its way. Then, another 45 minutes later, I finally got the cold, disappointing pizza. Lastly, I asked that there be no …More

name: Josh Gold
text: Great location, very friendly staff, plus our pizza and wings were on point! (very delicious). Ask for recommendations!

name: SpeakEasy Skate
text: I love small pizza shops. This place has everything a pizza shop needs.

name: One Term Trump TV Network
text: Awesome pizza.....great service. Hometown feel. Met the managers kids. Awesome environment.  Beer is good too.

name: Catherine Briane
text: This place is under new management now, not only is the food amaZing but the service is excellent! The new owners remodeled and it looks really good in there now everything is brand new.

name: Shane Conant
text: Was in Denver and pizza sounded good.  Looked at tons of websites and decided upon Pizza Extreme. …More

name: Lindsay Paulsen
text: Called to order a gf pizza for myself and a sandwhich for my husband. The delivery guy arrived with two pizzas and said to call to correct it, no one ever answered and i called three times. The gluten free pizza crust was probably the worst …More

name: chris bolger
text: Need one in castle Rock. Best pizza ever. Hands down

name: Haven Riney
text: Extreme Pizza had an extreme case of failure. Unable to provide even the most basic service, I cannot comment on the food as they were unable to provide any. While various excuses were given, the most likely of the ones provided was that the health inspector had suspended food service due to an Extreme violation.

name: Joelle Dozoretz
text: Pizza is amazing! The Thai salad is one of my personal favorites !

name: Jamie Carter
text: The best pizza, salads, sandwiches, exceptional service

name: Adam Clefe
text: Had a problem with my delivery due to new driver, but whoever was in charge was very helpful, fixed my problem, made amazing tasting food and got it to me hot and fresh.

name: Taylor Kolar
text: The first problem with thus businesses is that they hardly ever answer the phone and delivery time is to long. I called my pizza in an hour and a half ago and still no sign of them. I tried to call them but of course no one answered! What a surprise. Terrible service!!

name: Bobby Barajas
text: Delicious pizza, good spot.

name: Himansu Sha
text: No one pick d phone

text: It was amasing
